<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106236</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106236</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101530</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Shaky Future of the Salton Sea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Wackelige Zukunft des Salton Meeres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le futur précaire de la mer de Salton</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O futuro shaky do mar de Salton</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il futuro shaky del mare di Salton</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το τρεμάμενο μέλλον της θάλασσας Salton</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El futuro inestable del mar de Salton</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A former desert oasis faces environmental challenges, a water crisis and someday the Big One. Why we can't let the sun go down on the Salton Sea.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein ehemaliger Wüste Oasis stellt 
Klimaherausforderungen, eine Wasserkrise und eines Tages das grosse 
gegenüber. Warum wir nicht die Sonne unten auf das Salton Meer 
gehen lassen können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une ancienne oasis de désert fait face à des 
défis environnementaux, à une crise de l'eau et un jour la grande. 
Pourquoi nous ne pouvons pas laisser le soleil aller vers le bas
sur la mer de Salton.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um oasis anterior do deserto enfrenta desafios 
ambientais, uma crise da água e someday grande. Porque nós 
não podemos deixar o sol ir para baixo no mar de Salton.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'oasi precedente del deserto affronta le sfide 
ambientali, una crisi dell'acqua e qualche giorno quella grande. 
Perchè non possiamo lasciare il sole andare giù sul mare di 
Salton.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια προηγούμενη όαση ερήμων αντιμετωπίζει τις 
περιβαλλοντικές προκλήσεις, μια κρίση ύδατος και someday 
μεγάλη. Γιατί δεν μπορούμε να αφήσουμε τον ήλιο να πάει 
κάτω στη θάλασσα Salton.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un oasis anterior del desierto hace frente a 
desafíos ambientales, a una crisis del agua y algún día la grande. 
Porqué no podemos dejar el sol ir abajo en el mar de Salton.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

            </role>

END:VCARD</entity>

        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>

            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106236</entry>
    </identifier>

      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/the-shaky-future-of-the-salton-sea</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
